Html:
Hi,

I would like to put a small image and a label next to my RibbonComboBox.
How can I achieve that ?
Currently, all that I can managed to do is put a label above the combo box...

Thank you very much.

Hi Roubachof,

It appears you have uncovered a bug in our RibbonComboBox.  The RibbonComboBox does not currently have logic built to display the LabelTitle and Small/LargeImageSource from the RibbonCommand which is assigned to it.  You could try to retemplate RibbonComboBox in your app to display a label and icon, or it might be easier to just use a RibbonDropDownButton until we fix this in V1.

Thanks,
Samantha

Hi Samantha,

Ok that what I thought...
Good idea, I will definitely retemplate the combo box.
I had a look at the DropDown, but I want the control to display the current selection, which the drop down cannot achieve.
Thanks for this great preview anyway!
